ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 10
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Look for a mechanical rat Cleaner VII if I remember correctly, then bring it to that NPC. I think he will give you more of the quest instructions then,
ygData.messageBody:
Sahaqiel@... wrote:

> From: Sahaqiel@...
>
> i am here!
>
> my question pertains to a dwarven quest. i tried talking to an npc in
> kaladim and he woudln't speak to me unless i killed some dwarven bandits.
> this i did (and they were VERY tough!) and he gave me quest to kill rats in
> the mines. now, is it just me or are rats way too weak for someone who can
> kill the bandits to hunt? also i have been in the mines and they seem quite
> small and i have seen no rats. does anyone know if there are parts to the
> mine i'm not finding? it just seems like 1 circular tunnel. thanks in
> advance for any advice!
>
> Maccabee, The Hammer
> Paladin 9, Karana Server
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking for a new hobby? Want to make a new friend?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Come join one of over 150,000 e-mail communities at ONElist!

Look for a mechanical rat Cleaner VII if I remember correctly, then bring it to
that NPC.
I think he will give you more of the quest instructions then, something about a
blacksmith
I believe.

Corrum
16 Warrior Karana
